# Sultan (Taito do Brasil 1979)

| **ROM** | [Pinball Nirvana](https://pinballnirvana.com/forums/resources/new-fixed-roms-for-vpinmame-v3-6-0-963-beta.8379/) | Use  `sinbadn.zip` after unzipping the main `-NEW FIXED ROMS for VPinMAME v3.6.0-963 BETA.zip` file | [Rock-ola](https://pinballnirvana.com/forums/members/rock-ola.1/) |

## Status 
**Minimum VPX Standalone build:** 10.8.0-5b941e6

| Backglass | DMD | ROM Required | Has Puppack | FPS |
|-----------|-----|-----|-----|-----|
| :white_check_mark: | :x: | :white_check_mark: | :x: | 60 |

---

## Instructions

- Install this table through the Table Manager, using the `Add Table` > `Manual` page
- If you need help, more information found on the wiki: [TM - Add Table - Manual](https://github.com/LegendsUnchained/vpx-standalone-alp4k/wiki/%5B04%5D-%F0%9F%A7%A1-TM-%E2%80%90-Other-Features#add-table---manual)
- If the table requires any additional files/steps, click `GO TO TABLE` after adding, and the TM will open to the relevant table folder.
- If you're remembering this table as having four flippers, you want Gottlieb's "Sinbad" from 1978.

“A loss that can be repaired by money is not of such very great importance.”
